snippet.title: Flock! - Xbox 360 Gameplay (XBLA)
snippet.description:
The footage is from the Xbox One, as the game is backward compatible.

Originally released in 2009, FLOCK! uses a sophisticated physics engine that drives the challenging puzzle elements of the game. Whether it's using the Tractor beam to move obstacles out of the way, or the Depressor beam to stamp out crop circles to guide your herds, being an extraterrestrial has never been this addictive. Friends can also join in through co-op play. And when all the levels have been completed, users can make their own with the level editor that comes with the game.

Flock! is also available physically as part of the Capcom Digital Collection, released exclusively on Xbox 360.

Flock! (C) CAPCOM
Developed by Proper Games
Also available on PC and PlayStation 3
